definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Women get off on judging each other, especially their very own friends.
sentences.chinese: 女人天性心爱品论他人，特别是评论自己的好朋友。

sentences.english: Jane bridled her favourite horse yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天简给她心爱的马装上了马鞍。

sentences.english: He has to do lone heroes to save his beloved woman.
sentences.chinese: 他要做孤胆英雄去拯救自己心爱的女人。

sentences.english: s2 And, in this case, I start with helium -is 1s2.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况心爱，氦开始的是。

sentences.english: I want to be together with the person I love.
sentences.chinese: 我愿与心爱的人一起相守。

sentences.english: Then he took his beloved gratifying profits went to my friend's house.
sentences.chinese: 于是他带了心爱的瓷碗去了朋友家。

sentences.english: The anticipation of waiting for a loved on to exit the terminal.
sentences.chinese: 在终点站等一个心爱的人。

sentences.english: The Shao people were moved from their beloved Lalu to the upper Sun Moon Village.
sentences.chinese: 在少人从他们心爱的拉鲁到上日月潭村。

sentences.english: Remain within the sight and touch of the Holy Spirit, my beloved Spouse.
sentences.chinese: 请长留在圣神的目光和触感之中，祂是我心爱的净配。

sentences.english: She is bewailing the loss of her beloved husband.
sentences.chinese: 她在为失去心爱的丈夫而痛哭。

sentences.english: The home whose garden held her beloved husband's grave.
sentences.chinese: 在房子花园里还有她心爱的丈夫的坟墓。

sentences.english: She also sprinkles in something near and dear to her heart, military support.
sentences.chinese: 她也写些文章讲讲近况，心爱的东西，军事支持。

sentences.english: The only gift for the girl who really loves her pets to death.
sentences.chinese: 这是送给那个她心爱的宠物死亡了的女孩的唯一礼物。

sentences.english: They come through other channels as Lady Portia and Beloved Ascended Master Saint Germain.
sentences.chinese: 他们通过其他，波西亚女士和心爱的扬升大师圣杰曼。

sentences.english: HanShan pain to deaf school, watching loitered simple beloved children.
sentences.chinese: 韩珊痛苦地踯躅到聋哑学校，看着单纯心爱的孩子们。

definition: to admire wholeheartedly/to fall in love with
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
